description: This is a Flutter source file defining a registration page widget that manages user registration UI and logic within a mobile app. It includes form validation, state management, and navigation.

classes.name: RegisterPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing user registration interface.

classes.name: _RegisterPageState
classes.description: State management for RegisterPage, handling form inputs, validation, submission, and navigation.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Releases resources for text controllers when widget is removed.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, calls the registration method, and navigates or shows errors.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the registration form UI with input fields and buttons.
